product_desc:
Xcontrol iCafe Professional:  
In production on over 80 Cruise Ships, the leading iCafe solution tailored for modern onboard maritime use.  Runs on C# and SQL Server.

Enterprise Management System:  
Shore-side monitoring system that allows Cruise Companies to manage their onboard iCafe systems from one location. Real Time Alerting, Fleet Reporting and Pricing Model/Content Controls. Runs on C# and SQL Server.

Cruise Media Center:
Allows Passengers to purchase & access Video On Demand via Cabin IPTVs and Personal Mobile Devices. Xcontrol is a Widevine and PlayReady Partner for Content Protection and Digital Rights Management (DRM). Runs on Liferay.

EveryWare Portal:
Centralized Portal provides Guests with Internet, Streaming Media and Onboard Reservations & Purchases.  Runs on Liferay.
high_concept: Developing New Technologies for the Cruise Industry
name: Xcontrol
